kDesc
Who wouldn’t want to lay in a chair that is as radiant as the person laying in it? [#Legal]
Qui ne voudrait pas à jeter dans une chaise qui est aussi radieuse que la personne pose en elle? [#Legal]
Wer würde sich nicht gerne in einen Sessel legen, der genauso wundervoll aussieht wie die Person darin? [#Legal]
Chi non vorrebbe distendersi su una poltrona che risplende tanto quanto la persona che vi si è distesa sopra? [#Legal]
¿Quién rechazaría tumbarse en un diván tan radiante como la persona que esté tumbada en él? [#Legal]
Who wouldn’t want to lay in a chair that is as radiant as the person laying in it? [#Legal]
기대어 있는 사람 만큼이나 멋진 의자라면 그 누가 앉아보고 싶지 않겠어요? [#Legal]
Who wouldn’t want to lay in a chair that is as radiant as the person laying in it? [#Legal]
這張椅子與坐上去的人同樣光芒四射，有誰不想坐上去？ [#Legal]
這張椅子與坐上去的人同樣光芒四射，有誰不想坐上去？ [#Legal]
Who wouldn’t want to lay in a chair that is as radiant as the person laying in it? [#Legal]
